drupalNodeEvent.title: Book Event: The Rise and Fall of the East by Yasheng Huang

field_speakers.processed:
Professor Yasheng Huang
Professor Lynette H. Ong
Professor John Yasuda

field_description.processed: Join us on Thursday, December 14 at 2:30 PM ET as Yasheng Huang, Professor at MIT Sloan School of Management, discusses his book The Rise and Fall of the EAST: How Exams, Autocracy, Stability, and Technology Brought China Success, and Why They Might Lead to Its Decline with John Yasuda, Assistant Prosessor at Johns Hopkins University and chaired by the Munk School's Professor Lynette Ong.
